Title: Authorizes gifts, on personal income tax returns, for public hospitals
Summary: Authorizes gifts, on personal income tax returns, for public hospitals; establishes the public hospitals fund for the receipt and expenditure of monies from such gifts; directs the department of health to provide grants to public hospitals.
LawCode: Add ยง629-b, Tax L; add ยง89-j, St Fin L; add ยง2827, Pub Health L
